abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie Mr Donkey, directed by Zhou Shen and Liu Lu.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Mr. Donkey,’ a Village School’s Ruse Farcically Backfires

snippet: A parable about China’s past and perhaps its present underlies this mildly stagy and intermittently manic adaptation....
lead_paragraph: A parable about China’s past and perhaps its present underlies this mildly stagy and intermittently manic adaptation.
